direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve fetching details or snapshots related to managed sub-accounts.
Both methods involve operations related to managed sub-accounts and have similar parameter handling and request structures.
Both methods involve operations on managed sub-accounts and can be tested using similar setup and teardown procedures.
Both methods access and manipulate sub-account data, though for different purposes.
Both methods handle similar types of exceptions related to sub-account operations.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of sub-account is required before performing snapshot operations.
Environment setup is necessary to ensure proper functioning of sub-account operations.
Depositing assets into the managed sub-account can be a prerequisite for snapshot operations.
Withdrawing assets can be a post-operation check for snapshot consistency.
Verifying the consistency of the snapshot can be part of the assertion process.
Comparing snapshots can help in asserting the correctness of the snapshot operation.
